metadata.title: CVE-2020-10941 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Arm Mbed TLS before 2.16.5 allows attackers to obtain sensitive information (an RSA private key) by measuring cache usage during an import.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.5-1ubuntu1').
